Fat Man Challenges

We have quaterly and annual challenges. The big one for the year is the 1000km 2017 challenge. We also have the Angkor Wat Half Marathon coming up and RED - Run Every Day December!

On the Go Now

1000km 2017

Keep running until you have knocked off 100km in 2017

All year 2017

TheBlaze
